name: Browser_Navigate
description:
Browser_Navigate navigates the user to a different page/screen in the application without reloading.
This function is never actually called - it exists only for schema generation.
The actual execution is intercepted by ExecuteToolWithContext.

Navigates the user to a different screen/route in the application without reloading the browser.
Use this tool when the user asks to go to a specific page, view, or section of the application.

Available routes (auto-generated on 2026-01-25T05:29:38.021Z):

**Main Routes:**
- `/activity` - Activity page
- `/admin/plugins` - Admin plugins page
- `/analytics` - Analytics page
- `/boards` - Boards page
- `/broadcasts` [tabs: all, my-broadcasts, pending, completed] - Broadcasts page
- `/gamification` - Gamification page
- `/home` - Home page
- `/integrations` - Integrations page
- `/motivation` - Motivation page
- `/onboarding` - Onboarding page
- `/plugins` - Plugins page
- `/profile` - Profile page
- `/shared-with-me` - Shared with me page
- `/stripe` - Stripe page
- `/stuff` - Stuff page
- `/tasks` - Tasks page
- `/welcome` - Welcome page
- `/workspace/all` - Workspace all page

**Settings Routes:**
- `/settings` [tabs: favorites, basics, advanced] - Settings page
- `/settings/analytics` [tabs: settings] - Settings analytics page
- `/settings/approvals` - Settings approvals page
- `/settings/boards` - Settings boards page
- `/settings/categories` - Settings categories page
- `/settings/categories/custom-fields` - Settings categories custom fields page
- `/settings/forms` [tabs: list, builder] - Settings forms page
- `/settings/gamification` [tabs: settings] - Settings gamification page
- `/settings/global` - Settings global page
- `/settings/job-positions` - Settings job positions page
- `/settings/kpi-cards` [tabs: settings] - Settings kpi cards page
- `/settings/kpi-cards/manage` - Settings kpi cards manage page
- `/settings/motivation` [tabs: settings] - Settings motivation page
- `/settings/priorities` - Settings priorities page
- `/settings/roles-and-permissions` - Settings roles and permissions page
- `/settings/slas` [tabs: slas, alerts, policies] - Settings slas page
- `/settings/spots` - Settings spots page
- `/settings/spots/types` - Settings spots types page
- `/settings/statuses` - Settings statuses page
- `/settings/tags` - Settings tags page
- `/settings/teams` - Settings teams page
- `/settings/templates` - Settings templates page
- `/settings/test` - Settings test page
- `/settings/users` - Settings users page
- `/settings/workflows` - Settings workflows page
- `/settings/workspaces` - Settings workspaces page

**Compliance Routes:**
- `/compliance/standards` - Compliance standards page
- `/compliance/standards/:id` (params: :id) - Compliance standards specific id page

**Authentication Routes:**
- `/auth/invitation/:token` (params: :token) - Auth invitation specific token page
- `/auth/signin` - Auth signin page
- `/auth/signup` - Auth signup page

**Other Routes:**
- `/boards/:boardId` (params: :boardId) - Boards specific board id page
- `/plugins/:pluginId/settings` (params: :pluginId) [tabs: settings] - Plugins specific plugin id settings page
- `/workspace/:id` (params: :id) - Workspace specific id page
- `/workspace/:id/board` (params: :id) - Workspace board/kanban view
- `/workspace/:id/calendar` (params: :id) - Workspace calendar view
- `/workspace/:id/map` (params: :id) - Workspace map view
- `/workspace/:id/scheduler` (params: :id) - Workspace scheduler view
- `/workspace/:id/settings` (params: :id) - Workspace settings and configuration
- `/workspace/:id/statistics` (params: :id) - Workspace statistics and analytics

**Usage Examples:**
- To navigate to settings: use path `/settings`
- To navigate to a specific workspace: use path `/workspace/<workspace_id>`
- To navigate to categories: use path `/settings/categories`
- To navigate to Broadcasts: use path `/broadcasts?tab=all`
- To navigate to Broadcasts: use path `/broadcasts?tab=my-broadcasts`
- To navigate to Broadcasts: use path `/broadcasts?tab=pending`
- To navigate to Settings: use path `/settings?tab=favorites`
- To navigate to Settings: use path `/settings?tab=basics`
- To navigate to Settings: use path `/settings?tab=advanced`
- To navigate to Settings analytics: use path `/settings/analytics?tab=settings`

**Important Notes:**
- Always use the exact path format shown above
- Replace dynamic parameters (like :id, :pluginId, :boardId) with actual values when navigating
- Include URL query parameters (?tab=...) when navigating to pages with tabs or specific views
- The navigation happens instantly without page reload, preserving the application state
- If the user asks to 'go to' or 'open' a page, use this tool
